org.talend.designer.core.model.utils.emf.talendfile
Interface ContextParameterType

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContextParameterTypeImpl
public interface ContextParameterType
extends org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject

A representation of the model object 'Context Parameter Type'.

The following features are supported:

  • Comment
  • Name
  • Prompt
  • Prompt Needed
  • Type
  • Value

See Also:
TalendFilePackage.getContextParameterType()
